A 3 bedroom resale flat, Orchid Garden Suncity ,Sector 54 Gurgaon  located in sector-54, gurgaon, is available. It is a ready to move in semifurnished flat located in orchid gardens. Situated in a prominent locality, it is a 1-5 year old property, which is in its prime condition. The flat is on the ground floor of the building. Aesthetically designed, this property has 3 bathroom(S). The property also has 3 balcony(S) and servant room and pooja room. The flat faces the east direction and has a good view of the locality. The flat is a freehold property and has a super built-Up area of 2035 sq. Ft. The flat is located in a gated society and offers good security. It offers a number of important facilities like lift(S), park, visitor parking, water storage, intercom facility, security/fire alarm, internet/wi-Fi connectivity, swimming pool, waste disposal, security personnel, private garden/terrace, water purifier, fitness centre/gym, water softening plant, rain water harvesting, shopping centre, club house/community center and piped-Gas. The unit has 1 covered parking and 1 open parking and full power backup. It has a water supply from the municipal corporation and borewell/tank.

Auric Group proudly launches a low-rise residential property with the name Auric Sattva S3 Homes in Greater Faridabad area. It is located at Sector 85, Neharpar, Greater Faridabad with remarkable road connectivity. This low-rise property is aesthetically designed keeping in mind the requirements of the buyers.  Auric Sattva S3 Homes offers a dynamic floor plan of this residential property. The project is spread in 10 acres of land with the plot size 157 sq. yds and saleable area 117 sq. yds. Each tower has 4 floors having 3BHK in units. Buyers can choose a 3BHK property that encompasses a basement, upper ground floor, first floor, second floor, and third floor with roof right. You can choose from the range of available inventories.  Auric Sattva S3 Homes also present some remarkable specifications that makes this project worth investing. You can enjoy the benefit of the amenities offered by Auric Group which includes round the clock security service, Earthquake resistant structure, Fire-fighting systems, water storage facility, adequate parking space, sports recreation zone, power backup, rainwater harvesting facility, and a shopping complex inside the society.  Apart from this, some green space is used for creating sprawling green parks and courtyard for children to play. Auric Homes are planned with an eco- friendly approach. This amazing property is to persuade home buyers for sensible investment. In addition, the layout of the 3BHK property all the floors are similar, but the value of the property differs as per the unit. If you are opting for the upper ground floor and the third-floor cost will be 47 lakhs whereas if you are looking for first and second floor, then the rates would be 45 lakhs. You can enjoy the benefit of terrace if you are buying the third floor.  Apart from this, Auric Homes offer inimitable features that make it exclusive. While booking the property, you just need to pay the booking amount. You dont have to pay EMI till the time you get possession of the property. Moreover, you can also avail the option of a loan. This affordable housing scheme offers a 90% loan.454

ROF Amaltas, an affordable housing project in sector 92, Gurgaon by Ramada Group, the project includes 1 and 3 BHK flats in various layouts. Also, the total Coverage Area of this project is 5 Acres with 50 % open space. The cost of the flats is fixed which is Rs 4000 for every sq.ft for the carpet area and Rs 500 for every sq.ft for the balcony territory.  ROF Amaltas Sector 92 Gurgaon an affordable housing project in Gurgaon built under every one of the norms of HUDA Affordable housing policy. The project composes all the basic and modern amenities for the classic lifestyle.  As we all know Sector 92 is one of the prime areas of Gurgaon and is encompassed by industrial and commercial projects, financial hub and educational institutes trusted medical clinics and shopping complex. Moreover, the projects are well known for their high-efficiency design, quality work, and execution. The ROF affordable Sector 92 offers a great value proposition both in terms of a residence and investment. Established in 1970, Shapoorji Pallonji Real Estate, based out of Mumbai, is a well regarded and reputed player in the Indian real estate sector with a roster of several landmark projects located across the country. The company, with strong presence both in India and overseas, is the first Indian construction entity to initiate business in the Middle East. Since inception, Shapoorji Pallonji Real Estate has been engaged in the construction of residential, commercial, industrial, and infrastructure properties. The first Indian company to construct two 60-storey residential towers in Mumbai and the famous Royal Palace for Sultan of Oman, Shapoorji Pallonji Real Estate has also offered some of the best green buildings in Chennai, Manesar, Dehradun, Delhi, and Mumbai. Moreover, the group has created several architectural marvels in order to provide inspired living and improved lifestyles to its customers.  Shapoorji Pallonji JoyVille is being advertised as the ideal confluence of an evolved structural design and modern engineering for contemporary construction. This under construction hi-rise project (with 4 towers) has been meticulously conceived keeping every small and big detail in mind. The exquisite creation will feature lush green landscapes inside the 18-acre development (and over 75% open space) with the intent that residents experience a contemporary lifestyle balanced by a peaceful and energized living ambiance. A perfect combination of spacious 2 and 3 BHK apartments, sprawled over super built-up area measuring between 915 to 1,692 square feet, in Shapoorji Pallonji JoyVille will exhibit wonderfully designed modern day architecture. Its possession has been scheduled to be handed over to home buyers in June 2022. An aggregate of 500 apartment units were launched as a part of this property.   Strategically located in the happening Sector 102 of Gurugram, Shapoorji Pallonji JoyVille is approximately 15-minute drive away from IGI Airport, 10 minutes away from Dwarka Sec 21 (existing Metro), 20 minutes driveable distance from MG Road (Gurugram), 25 minutes away from Golf Course Road (Gurugram) & South Delhi, and 45 minutes drive time away from New Delhi Railway Station.  Aesthetic beauty will be clubbed with a host of premium & leisure amenities for an utterly comfortable and lavish lifestyle. The masterfully crafted residential development will provide vast open spaces and expansive greenery for a truly exceptional living experience away from the citys hustle bustle. Every inch of this residential enclave has been shown detailed attention in order to fulfil the requirements of idyllic living. The beautifully crafted Shapoorji Pallonji Joyville will hold immense greenery, provide ultra luxury modern facilities, offer effectively planned apartments for maximum space utilization, be enabled with advanced high security systems, and many more perks to make it worth living and not just existing! Wide open balconies for fresh air & natural daylight, entrance lobby with high ceiling, landscaped garden on podium, CCTV in select common areas, swimming pool, gymnasium, high speed elevators, back-up generator, private courtyards (in each apartment), yoga deck, jogging track, tot lot area, tennis court, clubhouse, fire fighting equipments, and Giga-fibre enabled homes are some of the many proposed amenities to meet every need of its residents.  Joyville is more than just a residential community it is beautiful address where nothing is really far away from home!

Newly launched residential project SHAPOORJI PALLONJI JOYVILLE by Indias No.1 Construction Company SHAPOORJI PALLONJI REAL ESTATE located in Sector 102 on Dwarka Expressway Gurgaon. The project, spread over 18 acres, comprises of 1480 Apartments. The First Phase which has been launched comprises of 4 towers & 500 apartments with a tower height of G+15, G+19 & G+25 and also the Second Phase has been launched comprises of 4 towers & 500 apartments with a tower height of G+15, G+19 & G+25. Joyville is a one of a kind residential complex that offers not just homes, but a way of life that empowers the residents with the best of everything. Each home is built to perfection & adheres to the highest standards of quality and efficiency. The Joyville lifestyle offers a plethora of amenities and features that provides maximum value. They firmly believe that smart engineering can bring the world closer and make this planet a better place to live in.  They are a well-diversified business house, with clients in over 60 countries, delivering complex and challenging projects for over 150 years. They operate in 6 major business areas with 13 group companies and a strong employee base of over 60,000 people from across 40+ nationalities. Above all, they are engineers at the core.  The group has a 150-year legacy that bridges the earliest celebrated structures of India and the modern marvels. Under the exceptional leadership of the core team, Shapoorji Pallonji Real Estate is all set to innovate and adapt to the ever-evolving market. The company endeavours to create architectural icons that compliment and elevate their brand reputation. They Create history at every step in India & beyond.

Trisara Affordable Homes Highlights :  > Low-rise construction & symmetrical planning.  > Lifts in each tower.  > Assured biggest carpet areas in-class.  > More summer-resistant homes (due to open courtyards acting as regulatory air-pockets and producing a cooling effect).  > Unparalleled lighting and ventilation within each flat.  > Unobstructed open view of the garden courtyard from every balcony.  > 10 years warranty on our high-quality doors and windows, as well as walls & floor finishes.  > Every balcony comes with green planters installed.  > Abrasion, Heat and Fire-resistant Resin flooring in each unit (to keep your home cool while also lending a higher aesthetic appeal to the floors).  > Vertical Garden on Facade: Every tower has green climbers running from ground floor to the top floor, which also facilitate air purification and a healthier local environment.  > Green connected terraces with jogging track.  > Aangans to promote our traditional culture of social interactions & community living.  > Modern Ceramic Tiles in kitchens & bathrooms.  > Designed to resist earthquakes.  > State of the art contemporary architecture inspired from global standards of affordable housing.  > Excellent quality of construction.  > Assured unmatched value for money.  Trisara Affordable Homes - Location Highlights :  > 20 minutes from Rajiv Chowk  > 25 minutes from Huda City Centre Gurugram  > 40 min from Malls on MG Road  > 40 minutes from IGI T3  > 5 min from KMP Expressway  > 25 to 35 min from Medanta/Artemis/Max/Fortis/Paras Super Speciality Hospitals.  > Near golf-course extension & southern peripheral road.  > Hassle free drive from Rajeev Chowk, NH8, Subhash Chowk & Hero Honda Chowk.  > Close to proposed metro line that connects with Huda City Centre.  > Close to commercial sectors, vibrant business hubs and educational institutions such as KR Mangalam, GD Goenka & SCL World Academy.  > Multiple residential colonies nearby.  > Away from the city hustle bustle and nestled amid nature.  > Designed on sprawling 6 acres of land under the foothills of Aravali Hills.23
